Package de.lases.persistence.repository

Class SubmissionRepository

java.lang.Object
de.lases.persistence.repository.SubmissionRepository
public class SubmissionRepository extends Object
Offers get/add/change/remove operations on a submission and the possibility to get lists of submissions.

  • Constructor Details

    • SubmissionRepository

      public SubmissionRepository()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static Submission get​(Submission submission, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Takes a scientific forum dto that is filled with a valid id and returns a fully filled submission dto.
      Parameters:
      submission - A Submission dto that must be filled with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A fully filled Submission dto.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no submission with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • add

      public static void add​(Submission submission, Transaction transaction) throws DataNotWrittenException, KeyExistsException
      Adds a submission to the repository.
      Parameters:
      submission - A fully filled submission dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      KeyExistsException - If there is already a submission with the same id.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the submission is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • change

      public static void change​(Submission submission, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Changes the given submission in the repository.
      Parameters:
      submission - A fully filled submission dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no submission with the provided id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the submission is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • remove

      public static void remove​(Submission submission, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Takes a submission dto that is filled with a valid id and removes this submission from the repository.
      Parameters:
      submission - The submission to remove. Must be filled with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - The specified submission was not found in the repository.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • getList

      public static List<Submission> getList​(User user, Privilege privilege, ScientificForum scientificForum, Transaction transaction, ResultListParameters resultListParameters) throws DataNotCompleteException, NotFoundException
      Gets a list all submissions that belong to the specified user under the specified role (for example as editor, submitter, reviewer) from the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      user - A User dto with a valid id.
      privilege - As which role should the user act.
      scientificForum - A ScientificForum dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      resultListParameters - The ResultListParameters dto that results parameters from the pagination like filtering, sorting or number of elements.
      Returns:
      A list of fully filled submission dtos for all reviews that belong to the specified user in the specified role and the specified scientific forum.
      Throws:
      DataNotCompleteException - If the list is truncated.
      NotFoundException - If there is no user with the provided id or no scientific forum with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
      InvalidQueryParamsException - If the resultListParameters contain an erroneous option.

    • getList

      public static List<Submission> getList​(User user, Privilege privilege, Transaction transaction, ResultListParameters resultListParameters) throws DataNotCompleteException, NotFoundException
      Gets a list all submissions that belong to the specified user under the specified role (for example as editor, submitter, reviewer).
      Parameters:
      user - A User dto with a valid id.
      privilege - As which role should the user act.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      resultListParameters - The ResultListParameters dto that results parameters from the pagination like filtering, sorting or number of elements.
      Returns:
      A list of fully filled submission dtos for all reviews that belong to the specified user in the specified rol.
      Throws:
      DataNotCompleteException - If the list is truncated.
      NotFoundException - If there is no user with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
      InvalidQueryParamsException - If the resultListParameters contain an erroneous option.

    • getList

      public static List<Submission> getList​(ScientificForum scientificForum, Transaction transaction, ResultListParameters resultListParameters) throws DataNotCompleteException, NotFoundException
      Gets a list all submissions that belong to the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A ScientificForum dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      resultListParameters - The ResultListParameters dto that results parameters from the pagination like filtering, sorting or number of elements.
      Returns:
      A list of fully filled submission dtos for all reviews that belong to the specified scientific forum.
      Throws:
      DataNotCompleteException - If the list is truncated.
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
      InvalidQueryParamsException - If the resultListParameters contain an erroneous option.

    • addCoAuthor

      public static void addCoAuthor​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Adds the specified user to the specified submission as a co-author.
      Parameters:
      submission - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      user - A user dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • addReviewer

      public static void addReviewer​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Adds the specified user to the specified submission as a reviewer.
      Parameters:
      submission - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      user - A user dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • removeCoAuthor

      public static void removeCoAuthor​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Removes the specified co-author from the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      submission - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      user - A user dto with a valid id, which is a co-author in the aforementioned submission.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id or the provided user is not a co-author for the provided submission.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • removeReviewer

      public static void removeReviewer​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Removes the specified reviewer from the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      submission - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      user - A user dto with a valid id, which is a reviewer in the aforementioned submission.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id or the provided user is not a reviewer for the provided submission.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • countSubmissions

      public static int countSubmissions​(User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Count the number of submissions where the specified user is author.
      Parameters:
      user - A user dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      The number of submission the specified user authored.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no user with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
